description:
Helping innocent accident victims and their families throughout Washtenaw County and the greater Detroit metro area as well as all across the state for more than 45 years now, Logeman Iafrate & Logeman PC has become one of our region's premier legal practices for individuals and families who suffered a serious injury or lost a loved one as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

Over the course of our law firm's history, we have recovered hundreds of millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff clients, including numerous multimillion-dollar settlements and verdicts. No matter the cause of your suffering, you can rely on us for aggressive advocacy and highly personalized counsel at all turns to help increase your chances of obtaining the maximum amount of compensation you need and the justice you deserve.

Honored for our outstanding professionalism and unwavering commitment to our clients, our lawyers have earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from our peers as being among the top 2.5% of lawyers in our region. We have also received the 10 Best in Client Satisfaction Award from the American Institute of Personal Injury Attorneys, and our law firm has received numerous testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients.

To begin the process of securing a brighter and more financially stable future for yourself and your family following an accident that was not your fault, you can reach out to the lawyers at Logeman Iafrate & Logeman PC to receive a free evaluation of your claim. Our law office also offers virtual consultations in these uncertain times to help keep you and your loved ones safe and healthy.
